summary: This is an email from November 23, 2021, regarding a draft letter about a witness order for an upcoming trial. The sender attaches a draft document and suggests discussing the order, opting for the most likely sequence rather than the fastest possible trial version.

events.title: Draft Witness Order Communication
events.description: An email is sent discussing a draft letter regarding the anticipated witness order for an upcoming trial.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 23, 2021, concerning trial preparation.
It references a draft letter about a government-anticipated witness order.
The sender attached a draft document titled '2021-11-27,_GM,_Government_anticipated_witness_order.docx'.
The sender chose to propose the most likely witness order rather than the order for the fastest possible trial.
The email suggests a follow-up conversation to discuss the proposed order.
